_sText:
Bravesurf proudly presents the first map in the td_ categody: td_facethevil
This map is built on the concept of tower defence, most commonly known, I think, from Warcraft Frozen Throne.

The map is small in size and easy to get the hang of.
The main idea is for CT's to send as much zombies to the terrorists as possible, and the T's should try to kill the zombies before they reach the end of the map. Simple as that.
The map counts how many terrorists there are, and set the difficulty both in weapon and health accordingly.
1-3 terrorist(s) = m249
4-6 terrorists = m4a1
7-9 terrorists = elite
10-12 terrorists = glock
13-14 terrorists = deagle
"But, deagle is better than glock?" you say. Not in this game. The more bullets you can throw at the zombies the better. 
The less people the more teamplay is required. And face it, if there are 14 stressed terrorists there wont be much teamplay. lol

Max : 14terrorists & 2counter-terrorists.
Remember to add these commands:
mp_limitteams 0
mp_autoteambalance 0

Have fun, comment, and suggest improvements!

CREDS:
Fibbs - Awesome prefab timer I turned into a counter:) 

/Brave
